    <facet>

    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202767</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">School Uniforms: Point of View Writing</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schule-Uniformen: Gesichtspunkt-Schreiben</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Uniformes D'École : Écriture de point de 
vue</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uniformes Da Escola: Ponto da escrita da 
vista</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Uniformi della scuola: Scrittura di punto
di vista</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχολικές στολές: Γράψιμο άποψης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Uniformes de la escuela: Escritura del 
punto de vista</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This lesson deals with an issue that is very important to students: school uniforms. It incorporates writing, speaking, and math.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Mathematics and Statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Lektion beschäftigt eine Ausgabe, die zu 
den Kursteilnehmern sehr wichtig ist: Schuleuniformen. Sie
enthält Schreiben, das Sprechen und Mathe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette leçon traite une issue qui est très 
importante pour des étudiants : uniformes d'école. Elle 
incorpore l'écriture, parler, et les maths.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta lição trata de uma edição que seja muito 
importante para estudantes: uniformes da escola. Incorpora
a escrita, o discurso, e o math.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa lezione si occupa di un'edizione che è 
molto importante agli allievi: uniformi della scuola. 
Comprende la scrittura, parlare ed il per la matematica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το μάθημα εξετάζει ένα ζήτημα που είναι πολύ 
σημαντικό στους σπουδαστές: σχολικές στολές. 
Ενσωματώνει το γράψιμο, μιλώντας, και math.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta lección se ocupa de una edición que sea muy
importante para los estudiantes: uniformes de la escuela. 
Incorpora la escritura, el discurso, y la matemáticas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mathematik und Statistiken</string>
          </keyword>
